remarks: Modular pair condition that implies the modular pair property in a sublattice.  Lemma 1.5.2 of [MaedaMaeda] p. 2.  (Contributed by NM, 24-Dec-2006.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
mdslmd.1 $e |- A e. CH $.
mdslmd.2 $e |- B e. CH $.
mdslmd.3 $e |- C e. CH $.
mdslmd.4 $e |- D e. CH $.
mdslmd4i $p |- ( ( A MH B /\ ( ( A i^i B ) C_ C /\ C C_ A ) /\ ( ( A i^i B ) C_ D /\ D C_ B ) ) -> C MH D ) $.
